title: Jet Cash
author: Jet Cash
content: I'm thinking of getting a narrow boat next year, and living in that. This one would do me, but Bitcoin needs to go up a bit if I'm going to buy it.https://www.ebay.co.uk/itm/364213326228?_trkparms=amclksrc%3DITM%26aid%3D777008%26algo%3DPERSONAL.TOPIC%26ao%3D1%26asc%3D20230105140155%26meid%3Dbcfaa596641c41dea10fc1e23dad75aa%26pid%3D101666%26rk%3D1%26rkt%3D1%26itm%3D364213326228%26pmt%3D0%26noa%3D1%26pg%3D2380057%26algv%3DRecentlyViewedItemsV2&_trksid=p2380057.c101666.m5481&_trkparms=pageci%3A250ab5ed-edac-11ed-884a-ca10dfd94cbb%7Cparentrq%3Afbc08cdc1870a45ea8e56b74fffa8a22%7Ciid%3A1

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: This is huge. I see from your previous post that you're not really the type to fancy staying in a stable location; you like moving around. I think this bolt really looks lucrative and fancy enough to serve you; maybe it should also have enough electrical power to support your little mining stuff. With the Bitcoin price going up next year, for you to achieve the exact cost of this bolt, you should be holding a huge amount of Bitcoin, which, if added to the profit that the next bull run will accumulate, will eventually get you your desired bolt.
